description:
Hike through valleys and up switchbacks with coverage and cushion. These socks have a minimalist design, mesh zones and reinforced toes keep your feet happy while you're out in the backcountry.

  • Made of soft merino wool, nylon, and elastane
  • 4-degree elite fit system uses 2 types of elastic for stretch, recovery and to keep the sock in place
  • Shred Shield™ reinforced toe cap adds durability
  • Indestructawool Technology in high-impact areas for durability and comfort
  • Mesh ventilation zones provide moisture management
  • Narrower profile suits those with narrower feet
name: Smartwool Hike Light Cushion Zig Zag Valley Mid Crew Socks - Women's
